name: 57cf6a9e-f686-4aad-bad6-91fa0c6b9922
displayName: Turning on my hotspot - Android device

text: Follow these steps and you got it! 1. Go to your device Settings 2. Select Connections, or Networks 3. Choose Mobile Hotspot and Tethering 4. Turn on your hotspot [MSG_LINE_BR~05000] Was this information helpful?$waSession.buttons.optionsYesNo
